snippet: Imagine if the Chinese, in a fit of pique, decided they would not sell this country another ham hock or breakfast link.
abstract: Loose Ends column by Damon Darlin lampoons some lawmakers' objections to Chinese food producer Shuanghui International buying Smithfield, largest pork producer in the United States.
lead_paragraph: Imagine if the Chinese, in a fit of pique, decided they would not sell this country another ham hock or breakfast link.

headline.print_headline: We Need Oil. They Need Pig.
headline.main: We Need Oil. They Need Pig.
